page.title: 05WILDLIFE
page.content: THERE IS QUITE A LOT OF WILDLIFE IN OUR AREA.ONE OF THE MOST COMMON ANIMALS IS THE FOX.THE FOX IS A BEAUTIFUL ANIMAL BUT IT IS A PEST TO FARMERS BECAUSE IT KILLS THE HELPLESS NEW BORN LAMBS AND THE HENS AND OTHER KINDS OF FOWL.AN OTHER TYPE OF ANIMAL IS THE HARE AND THE RABBIT.THEY ARE BOTH A PEST BECAUSE THEY EAT THE CROPS AND VEGETABLES.OYSTER CATCHERS IS A COMMON BIRD THAT YOU SEE YOU SHOULD MANAGE TO RECOGNISE IT WITH ITS ORANGE BEAK AND BLACK AND WHITE PLUMAGE YOU USUALLY FIND NESTS IN PLOUGHED FEILDS.OTHER ANIMALS YOU CAN FIND ARE BATS,HEDGHOGS,RATS,MICE,MOLES,SQURILS, BADGERS,WEASELS,STOATS,DEER,OWLS, PHEASANTS,PARTRIDGES,LAPWINGS AND HERONS.
